answers.answer: Welcome to the gastroenterology community!  You should see a doctor about this to get check out.

question: I have been feeling not so great for the past few days, today was the worst and when I just stood up it felt like something "leaked" out of my stomach area into the inside of my body. It was a little acridity but not  a lot . nausea, bad bad stomach cramps, bad headaches, aches and pains all over and I have diabetes.
title: stomach
